name: npm-run-all
description: A CLI tool to run multiple npm-scripts in parallel or sequential.

1.0.0.name: npm-run-all
1.0.0.description: A CLI tool to run multiple npm-scripts on sequential or parallel.

scripts.test: npm run build && mocha test/*.js --compilers js:espower-babel/guess --timeout 10000

1.0.1.name: npm-run-all
1.0.1.description: A CLI tool to run multiple npm-scripts on sequential or parallel.

scripts.test: npm run build && mocha test/*.js --compilers js:espower-babel/guess --timeout 10000

1.0.2.name: npm-run-all
1.0.2.description: A CLI tool to run multiple npm-scripts on sequential or parallel.

scripts.test: npm run build && mocha test/*.js --compilers js:espower-babel/guess --timeout 10000

1.0.3.name: npm-run-all
1.0.3.description: A CLI tool to run multiple npm-scripts on sequential or parallel.

scripts.test: npm-run-all build test:mocha
scripts.testing: npm run clean && npm-run-all --parallel testing:build testing:mocha

1.1.0.name: npm-run-all
1.1.0.description: A CLI tool to run multiple npm-scripts on sequential or parallel.

scripts.test: npm-run-all build test:mocha
scripts.testing: npm run clean && npm-run-all --parallel testing:build testing:mocha

1.1.1.description: A CLI tool to run multiple npm-scripts on sequential or parallel.

scripts.test: npm-run-all build test:mocha

1.1.2.description: A CLI tool to run multiple npm-scripts on sequential or parallel.

1.1.3.description: A CLI tool to run multiple npm-scripts on sequential or parallel.

1.2.0.name: npm-run-all
1.2.0.description: A CLI tool to run multiple npm-scripts on sequential or parallel.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build:babel
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:mocha
scripts.testing: npm run clean && npm run testing:build && npm run testing:mocha

1.2.1.name: npm-run-all
1.2.1.description: A CLI tool to run multiple npm-scripts on sequential or parallel.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build:babel
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:mocha
scripts.testing: npm run clean && npm run testing:build && npm run testing:mocha

1.2.2.name: npm-run-all
1.2.2.description: A CLI tool to run multiple npm-scripts on sequential or parallel.

scripts.test: npm-run-all build test:mocha

1.2.3.name: npm-run-all
1.2.3.description: A CLI tool to run multiple npm-scripts on sequential or parallel.

scripts.test: npm-run-all build test:mocha

1.2.4.name: npm-run-all
1.2.4.description: A CLI tool to run multiple npm-scripts on sequential or parallel.

scripts.build: npm-run-all clean lint && babel src --out-dir lib
scripts.test: npm run lint && istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- test/*.js --require mocha-babel-hook --colors --timeout 30000

scripts.test: npm run lint && istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- test/*.js --require mocha-babel-hook --colors --timeout 30000

readme:
| index | [npm-run-all] | [run-s] | [run-p] | [Node API] | |-------|---------------|---------|---------|------------| # npm-run-all [![npm version](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/npm-run-all.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/npm-run-all) [![Downloads/month](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/npm-run-all.svg)](http://www.npmtrends.com/npm-run-all) [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/mysticatea/npm-run-all.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/mysticatea/npm-run-all) [![Build status](https://ci.appveyor.com/api/projects/status/v0owd44q1r7hceir/branch/master?svg=true)](https://ci.appveyor.com/project/mysticatea/npm-run-all/branch/master) [![Coverage Status](https://codecov.io/gh/mysticatea/eslint-plugin-node/branch/master/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/gh/mysticatea/npm-run-all) [![Dependency Status](https://david-dm.org/mysticatea/npm-run-all.svg)](https://david-dm.org/mysticatea/npm-run-all) A CLI tool to run multiple npm-scripts in parallel or sequential. ## Motivation - **Simplify.** The official `npm run-script` command cannot run multiple scripts, so if we want to run multiple scripts, it's redundant a bit. Let's shorten it by glob-like patterns.
Before: `npm run clean && npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:html`
After: `npm-run-all clean build:*` - **Cross platform.** We sometimes use `&` to run multiple command in parallel, but `cmd.exe` (`npm run-script` uses it by default) does not support the `&`. Half of Node.js users are using it on Windows, so the use of `&` might block contributions. `npm-run-all --parallel` works well on Windows as well. ## Installation ```bash $ npm install npm-run-all --save-dev # or $ yarn add npm-run-all --dev ``` - It requires `Node@>=4`. ## Usage ### CLI Commands This `npm-run-all` package provides 3 CLI commands. - [npm-run-all] - [run-s] - [run-p] The main command is [npm-run-all]. We can make complex plans with [npm-run-all] command. Both [run-s] and [run-p] are shorthand commands. [run-s] is for sequential, [run-p] is for parallel. We can make simple plans with those commands. #### Yarn Compatibility If a script is invoked with Yarn, `npm-run-all` will correctly use Yarn to execute the plan's child scripts. ### Node API This `npm-run-all` package provides Node API. - [Node API] ## Changelog - https://github.com/mysticatea/npm-run-all/releases ## Contributing Welcome ### Bug Reports or Feature Requests Please use GitHub Issues. ### Correct Documents Please use GitHub Pull Requests. I'm not familiar with English, so I especially thank you for documents' corrections. ### Implementing Please use GitHub Pull Requests. There are some npm-scripts to help developments. - **npm test** - Run tests and collect coverage. - **npm run clean** - Delete temporary files. - **npm run lint** - Run ESLint. - **npm run watch** - Run tests (not collect coverage) on every file change. [npm-run-all]: docs/npm-run-all.md [run-s]: docs/run-s.md [run-p]: docs/run-p.md [Node API]: docs/node-api.md
